column2: A very feminine-looking man who can pass as a woman with the right clothing.
A very masculine-looking woman who can pass as a man with the right clothing.
awwwww! *nuzzles u back and pounces on u and notices your buldge* OwO what's this...?
An extremely female looking hermaphrodite. Prone to being oversexed, though typically not as fertile.\n§GCan get pregnant§!\n§GCan impregnate other women using LF-specific events/decisions.§!

By lovingly stroking and rubbing their magical rod, this character can get a faceful of warm, ethereal energy, which- when consumed- allows them to cast various magic spells. The lucky polishers own rods of up to a foot long, while the unlucky few are left fondling a wand no bigger than a twig.

Trained in the arcane arts. Sometimes referred to as a wizard or a witch.
§GCan summon a familiar.
Can cast the following spells with a spellbook:
   Heart Enslavement
   Trusting
   Fairy Fire
   Fireball
   Flamestrike
   Curse of the Snail
   Blessing of the Womb§!
